QuestData.Title: Vinyl: Mimiron's Brainstorm
QuestData.Description:
<This pressed vinyl is surprisingly still intact. Its label says it contains the recording of a song called "Mimiron's Brainstorm."
You should be able to install this vinyl into the gramophone back in Rustbolt.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Install the vinyl into the Rustbolt Gramophone.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Install the vinyl into the Rustbolt Gramophone.
